content_descriptors.notes:
The developer describes the content of the game as follows:

This game is dark sci-fi story, containing depictions of frequent sexual interactions between a human and alien creature. Additionally, the story deals with the horrors of an alien invasion on Earth.

The content in this game includes subjects such as:

- BDSM
- Group Sex
- Impregnation
- Dubious Consent
- Suicide
- Self Harm

name: Alien Breeding Program: First Contact Demo
